title: correlating logs
extract: Definition of Event Correlation. Event correlation takes data from either application logs or host logs and then analyzes the data to identify relationships. Tools that utilize event correlation can then perform actions, such as sending alerts for hardware or application failures, based on user-defined rules.Sep 12, 2018
